dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 50 x 51 cm (19 11/16 x 20 1/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 52.5 x 11 cm (20 11/16 x 4 5/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 55.9 x 43.2 cm (22 x 17 in.)
title: Chintz
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  Mordants for black, reds and purple applied by pen and brush over resist.  Madder dyed.  Blue applied over resist by immersion.  Yellow applied by brush. (chintz)
description: Stripes and flowers on white background.  Exotic blossoms with different fillings swirling over 2 different stripes.
name: Chintz
